ingredients.ingredient: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix

cookingTips: Layer roast with seasonings in slow cooker for better flavor distribution
Cook on low setting for 8-10 hours for maximum tenderness
Reserve cooking liquid to make gravy or serve alongside meat
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how slow, moist cooking breaks down tough cuts and how the seasoning packets create depth of flavor.
